mapper.sql: id, app_key, day, wsr_query_ald_link_key, wsr_query_ald_media_id, ag_ald_position_id, visitor_count, authuser_count, open_count, total_page_count, new_comer_count, total_stay_time, secondary_avg_stay_time, one_page_count, bounce_rate, new_people_ratio, authuser_people_ratio, update_at
mapper.insert: insert into aldstat_30days_link_monitor (id, app_key, day, wsr_query_ald_link_key, wsr_query_ald_media_id, ag_ald_position_id, visitor_count, authuser_count, open_count, total_page_count, new_comer_count, total_stay_time, secondary_avg_stay_time, one_page_count, bounce_rate, new_people_ratio, authuser_people_ratio, update_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day,jdbcType=DATE}, #{wsrQueryAldLinkKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wsrQueryAldMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agAldPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authuserCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newComerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalStayTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondaryAvgStayTime,jdbcType=REAL}, #{onePageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, #{authuserPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{day,jdbcType=DATE},
#{wsrQueryAldLinkKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wsrQueryAldMediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agAldPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{authuserCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{newComerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{totalStayTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{secondaryAvgStayTime,jdbcType=REAL},
#{onePageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL},
#{newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL},
#{authuserPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL},
#{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
SELECT mo.*,ce.link_name,me.media_name FROM(select * FROM aldstat_30days_link_monitor where `day`=#{date} and app_key=#{appkey} and wsr_query_ald_link_key != 'all' and ag_ald_position_id = 'all' and wsr_query_ald_media_id != 'all') mo INNER JOIN ald_link_trace ce on mo.wsr_query_ald_link_key=ce.link_key INNER JOIN ald_media me on mo.wsr_query_ald_media_id=me.media_id and me.media_name like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%') and ce.link_name like CONCAT('%',#{activitiesName},'%')
order by mo.${prop} ${order}
mapper.update:

visitor_count = #{record.visitorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

total_page_count = #{record.totalPageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

bounce_rate = #{record.bounceRate,jdbcType=REAL},
new_people_ratio = #{record.newPeopleRatio,jdbcType=REAL},

update_at = #{record.updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
